name: Dodger's dash
description:
Jenny decides to dodge school and dashes out.

The highly devoted headmaster chases her, and tries to make her return to school.
Will he catch her?

Join her in this vivid and action-packed endless runner

use left and right keys to avoid obstacles or collect candy

Shlomi Agiv - Programmer

Shachar Bergman - Art Director

Yuval Ben Hillel - Game Design
